Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I was wondering if there was any way or mod that could let me link these two authority limiter sliders

basically this is a dockrotate helicopter that has its ascent controlled like that of heli: by changing the pitch of the blades, issue is that I can only slide one at a time because they aren't linked to one another

You can use DockRotate to control the pitch too. Set the step to 1° for fine control, and an action group to increase the pitch. You can use another action group to reduce the pitch, or use the mod key to reverse the increase pitch action group.
